sentences.en: Being one kind of medical fungi, the Caput - medusae has its own medical worth.
sentences.cn: 药用真菌是指对疾病有治疗 、 预防或抑制作用以及对人体有保健作用的一类真菌.

sentences.en: Chronic portal hypertension may lead to development of collateral circulation , which is manifested as caput medusa in the region of the umbilicus and epigastrium.
sentences.cn: 慢性门脉高压可导致侧枝循环建立，可出现脐部和上腹部局部水母头样改变。

sentences.en: He appropriates all the profit and leaves the caput mortuum behind.
sentences.cn: 他把全部好处占为已有,而把无用的东西留给他人.

sentences.en: It also has remarkable curative effect for curing necrobiosis of caput femoris.
sentences.cn: 用本发明的组合物治疗股骨头坏死,也取得了非常好的疗效.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, anti - impulse and anti - force of compression of the inside bundle caput can be improved.
sentences.cn: 同时, 也可以有利于提高内包头的 抗 冲击力和 抗 压缩力.

sentences.en: Or a full - time teaching post in a government , Caput, Direct Subsidy Scheme or private school.
sentences.cn: 或受聘于官立 、 按位资助 、 直接资助或私立学校全职教席的教师.
